    • Method Detail

      • setImageSynchronizationDevices

        void setImageSynchronizationDevices(java.lang.String[] devices,
                                    int accessID)
                             throws SettingException,
                                    MicroscopeLockedException
        Sets the devices for which the microscope waits before an image is made. If devices is null, the microscope will not wait for any device.
        Parameters:
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        devices - Devices to which the imaging process should synchronize, or null.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • addImageSynchronizationDevice

        void addImageSynchronizationDevice(java.lang.String device,
                                   int accessID)
                            throws SettingException,
                                   MicroscopeLockedException
        Adds the given device to the list of image synchronization devices.
        Parameters:
        device - Device to add to the image synchronization list.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • removeImageSynchronizationDevice

        void removeImageSynchronizationDevice(java.lang.String device,
                                      int accessID)
                               throws SettingException,
                                      MicroscopeLockedException
        Removes the given device to the list of image synchronization devices.
        Parameters:
        device - Device to remove from the image synchronization list.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • getImageSynchronizationDevices

        java.lang.String[] getImageSynchronizationDevices()
        Returns the devices to which the microscope synchronizes when imaging.
        Returns:
        List of synchronizing devices.

      • getSystemStartupSettings

        DeviceSetting[] getSystemStartupSettings()
        Returns the settings which will be applied when the system starts up.
        Returns:
        Settings applied at startup.

      • setSystemStartupSettings

        void setSystemStartupSettings(DeviceSetting[] settings,
                              int accessID)
                       throws SettingException,
                              MicroscopeLockedException
        Set the setting which will be applied at startup. If settings == null, no settings will be applied.
        Parameters:
        settings - Settings which will be applied at startup.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • addSystemStartupSetting

        void addSystemStartupSetting(DeviceSetting setting,
                             int accessID)
                      throws SettingException,
                             MicroscopeLockedException
        Adds a setting to the list of settings which will be applied at startup. If the value of the device property is already defined by another setting, this overwrites the old setting.
        Parameters:
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        setting - A setting which should be applied at startup.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • getSystemShutdownSettings

        DeviceSetting[] getSystemShutdownSettings()
        Returns the settings which will be applied when the system shuts down.
        Returns:
        Settings applied at shutdown.

      • setSystemShutdownSettings

        void setSystemShutdownSettings(DeviceSetting[] settings,
                               int accessID)
                        throws SettingException,
                               MicroscopeLockedException
        Set the setting which will be applied at shutdown. If settings == null, no settings will be applied.
        Parameters:
        settings - Settings which will be applied at shutdown.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • addSystemShutdownSetting

        void addSystemShutdownSetting(DeviceSetting setting,
                              int accessID)
                       throws SettingException,
                              MicroscopeLockedException
        Adds a setting to the list of settings which will be applied at shutdown. If the value of the device property is already defined by another setting, this overwrites the old setting.
        Parameters:
        setting - A setting which should be applied at shutdown.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • getCommunicationTimeout

        int getCommunicationTimeout()
        Gets the timeout between in the communication with the devices.
        Returns:
        Timeout in ms.

      • setCommunicationTimeout

        void setCommunicationTimeout(int timeout,
                             int accessID)
                      throws SettingException,
                             MicroscopeLockedException
        Sets the timeout between in the communication with the devices.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in ms.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • setImageBufferSize

        void setImageBufferSize(int sizeMB,
                        int accessID)
                 throws SettingException,
                        MicroscopeLockedException,
                        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Sets the size of an internally used image buffer. Note that this function might not be used for any implementation.
        Parameters:
        sizeMB - Size of the image buffer, in MB.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown if no image buffer is supported by this implementation.

      • getImageBufferSize

        int getImageBufferSize()
                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Returns the size of the internally used image buffer. Note that this function might not be used for any implementation. Returns -1 if the image buffer size was not set, yet, or if a default value is used.
        Returns:
        Size in MB.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown if no image buffer is supported by this implementation.

      • getCommunicationPingPeriod

        int getCommunicationPingPeriod()
        Gets the wait time used when pinging a device if a certain action is finished.
        Returns:
        Ping period in ms.

      • setCommunicationPingPeriod

        void setCommunicationPingPeriod(int pingPeriod,
                                int accessID)
                         throws SettingException,
                                MicroscopeLockedException
        Sets the wait time used when pinging a device if a certain action is finished.
        Parameters:
        pingPeriod - Ping period in ms.
        accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
        Throws:
        SettingException
        MicroscopeLockedException
